title: Immuno-Zn
cleaned_text: Description Zinc is an essential mineral found in every body cell. It is essential for a wide range of physiological functions and is an important cofactor for more than 200 enzymes, more than any other mineral.* These lemon-flavored zinc lozenges are truly superior-tasting supplements for both children and adults. They contain zinc in the citrate form to support immune system function, which is especially important during the winter months.* The lozenge form also works well to support the tissues of the throat.* More Information Ingredients: Suggested Use: As a dietary supplement, take 1 lozenge in AM and 1 lozenge in PM, or as directed by your healthcare practitioner. Let dissolve in mouth. Supplement Facts Serving Size 1 Lozenge Servings Per Container 60 Amount per Serving % Daily Value Calories 5 Total Carbohydrates 1 g 0% Zinc (as Zn Citrate & Zn Gluconate) 23 mg 209% Stevia Leaf Extract 4 mg * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000-calorie diet. *Daily Value Not Established. Other Ingredients: xylitol, stearic acid, vegetable stearate, citric acid, honey powder, silica, natural lemon flavor. Color of this product may vary due to color variations of the natural ingredients. WARNING: If pregnant or nursing, consult your healthcare practitioner before taking this product. Disclaimer, Policies, Shipping Shipping Policy Most products ship within 2-3 business days of order receipt. Certain items ship within 7-10 business days. We reserve the right to consolidate shipments when the cart contains products from each fulfillment period. Return Policy We strive to provide products that will help you live a healthy life and our intent is to make you happy. Specialty Items are final sale and may not be returned. - 30 day money back on unopened products. Disclaimer The content of this website is based upon the opinion of Dr. Ellie Wright. The information on this website is not intended as medical advise nor to replace a one-on-one relationship with a qualified health care professional. Dr. Wright encourages you to make your own health care decisions based upon our research and to seek a qualified health care professional to help you. If you have a medical condition, if you are taking medications or if you are pregnant or nursing consult your health care professional before using products from this website. This website is intended to share information and knowledge obtained by Dr. Ellie Wright. FDA COMPLIANCE The information on this website has not been evaluated by the Food & Drug Administration or any other medical body. We do not aim to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness or disease. Information is shared for educational purposes only. You must consult your doctor before acting on any content on this website, especially if you are pregnant, nursing, taking medication or have a medical condition.
